abstract: New rules and new technology have led Wall Street to innovate, but they have also meant that old tricks appear in new guises, DealBook shows in its fall special section. | The woes of BlackBerry have put a spotlight on the Canadian mogul V. Prem Watsa. | A number of skilled financiers made billions after buying assets in the dark days of the financial crisis.
snippet: New rules and new technology have led Wall Street to innovate, but they have also meant that old tricks appear in new guises, DealBook shows in its fall special section. | The woes of BlackBerry have put a spotlight on the Canadian mogul V. Prem W...
lead_paragraph: New rules and new technology are changing the way Wall Street does business. That has led to innovation, but it has also meant that old tricks appear in new guises, as DealBook shows in its fall special section on ideas and innovation.
